Does anyone know why Bitcoin is going up?

It's trading like an asset with absolute scarcity that just had the most successful ETF launch in history after fighting to get the product approved for years.

Can't figure it out...

It's kinda insane how many unique strategies you can run in crypto now to get exposure.

2 cycles ago you either traded majors on Bitmex or piled into ICOs.

Last cycle if you said "L1s are bullish" I bought $SOL or $AVAX and there was one narrative at a time.

This cycle if you…

Normies aren't even going to start pouring into Crypto until we are past ATHs. 

Last cycle I had friends who could barely operate a computer running Crypto Facebook groups.

It gets way crazier than this lol.

Gonna keep it real, you prob just want to own as much of this shit as possible after Q1. Form main positions around BTC & high conviction bets, add a few very asymmetrical bets with small % of your port. Then hot glue your hands to your chair for 8 months. Think less bet more.

I know traders that know everything related to markets.

Historical rates, patterns, cycles, every terminology. Read thru every bestselling book. Subscribed to every finance-platform under the sun.

But end up make very little (if any) money.

Then I know a few traders that don't…

Interest in crypto is a function of where prices are right now.

Opportunity in crypto is a function of where prices will be in 6-12 months.

When interest reaches an extreme...opportunity is usually at the polar opposite value.
